page.title: 01INTRO & RECENT HISTORY
page.content:
The area we are surveying for the 1985 Domesday Project,includes the villages of Mylor and Feock, Restronguet Creek and a large part of Carrick Roads,(the estuary of the River Fal). The area contains mostly agricultural land with some wooded areas and small village comunities.
We chose to concentrate on the Mylor area because it was within the catchment area of our school and the children of the village attend the comprehensive school in Penryn.
Mylor has increased dramatically since World War 2.13 housing estate 4 shops and 2 council estates have been built.Also roads and the bridge have widened.There has been a major boom in Mylor in recent years as an area for the elderly.
